name: The Children Below the Inn
description:
It's the Medieval Ages and the low-born are known to be a superstitious lot, but even your friend Horace (the local inn keep) is beginning to believe recent rumors of demons and strange happenings lurking beneath his beloved inn. Local folks children been going missing, and some how the inn, or whatever is below the inn, is involved.

Features
  • Point and Click movement and interaction (Left Click to move, Right Click to interact)
  • Inventory System with Equipping (clothes, armor, weapons)
  • Low-poly modular interiors, equipment, furniture, npcs, and enemies.
  • NPC Dialogue
  • Milestone Mechanic
Credits

I want to give a HUGE thank you to my partner Clement Panchout for composing the music for the game. It amazes me the quality of work he can produce in such a short amount of time.

Check out more of his work at the following links:

  • https://soundcloud.com/clement-panchout
  • http://www.clementpanchout.com/

Also please give us both a follow on Twitter to keep up with our combined and separate works: @TAllenStudios @ClementPanchout

Note

This game is still in development, updates will be continuously released with more map area, new equipment, new npcs, new enemies, and other new features. Please check back for these updates.
